entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Melfort
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:34 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -25.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Melfort 07:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -25.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -34
Dewpoint: -29.2°C
Wind: SE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 18.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 35 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then snow. Blowing snow at times. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
